scripts.cypressReport: rm -rf cypress/reports && npx cypress run && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/*.json -o cypress/reports/merged-report.json && npx marge cypress/reports/merged-report.json --reportDir cypress/reports/html --reportFilename index.html
scripts.windowsReport: rmdir /s /q cypress\reports && npx cypress run && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/*.json -o cypress/reports/merged-report.json && npx marge cypress/reports/merged-report.json --reportDir cypress/reports/html --reportFilename index.html
